column5: Just wanted to let you know that anythime you are in Niagara, shoot me an email and we'll do some walleye fishing. (I thought we ought to continue the discussion on a new thread since this had nothing to do with the original..:) )
bigfish1965: Thanks for the very hospitable offer. I don't visit south western Ontario very often any more but I will keep your offer in mind. Thanks again. Jay
